title: Workshop in QML
content: We will give an overview of QML. From the basics of machine learning, through a quick reminder of quantum computation, to the very heart of QML. We will have an hands-on “Hello World” tutorial. Together, we will install all the necessary components and packages to run a QML algorithm on a real quantum device from your own laptop !. In the second session go through two leading QML algorithms : Variational Quantum Eigensolver (VQE) and Quantum Generative Adversarial Network (QGAN).

title: Xanadu Hackathon
content: The photonic quantum computing company Xanadu is holding an online Hackathon. It seems that the Hackathon will focus on Quantum Machine Learning (QML). In the week prior to the Hackathon we will conduct several workshops for preparation, so stay tuned for more information! Meanwhile, you can register for the Hackathon by clicking here, it’s free!
